import React from "react"; import * as TABLE from "../../dashboards/styles/table.styles"; import PulseLoader from "react-spinners/PulseLoader"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faSearch, faEdit, faTrashAlt, faPlus, faFileImport, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; const BookPublications = ({ isBookPubInfo }) => { return (
Title of the book Name of the Publishers National / International ISBN Year Action {!isBookPubInfo && } {isBookPubInfo && isBookPubInfo.length && isBookPubInfo.map((bookInfo) => ( {bookInfo.bookTitle} {bookInfo.publisherName} {bookInfo.bookPublicationType} {bookInfo.isbnNo} {bookInfo.bookPublicationYear} ))}
); }; export default BookPublications;
